title: Want to Play Unblocked Games at School? Here are 20 Fun Games to Try

steps.title: Chess.
steps.content: Chess. Chess is a classic game, plus it's a great way to practice logic and keep your mind busy. While your school might have Chess.com blocked, there are a lot of Chess.com clones that you can try. To play chess, try one of these links: https://www.pleasedontblockchess.com https://www.superhardalgebraproblems.com https://www.justdoinghomework.com

steps.title: Run 3.
steps.content: Run 3. Run 3 is a fun, fast-paced obstacle course game that can keep you from getting too bored during study hall or recess. To play Run 3, try one of these links: https://player03.com/run/3/beta/ https://www.coolmathgames.com/0-run-3 https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/462215869/

steps.title: 3D Tetris.
steps.content: 3D Tetris. Original Tetris is fun, but if you want to take it to the next level, try 3D Tetris. In 3D Tetris, you have to move your pieces in three directions to stack them up. To play 3D Tetris, try one of these links: https://www.3dtetris.com https://www.ebhasin.com/games/Tetris3D/index.html

steps.title: Checkers.
steps.content: Checkers. Like chess, checkers is another classic game that can help you flex your logical muscles and stay busy for hours. To play checkers, try one of these links: https://www.mathsisfun.com/games/checkers-2.html https://www.247checkers.com https://www.coolmathgames.com/0-checkers

steps.title: Cut the Rope.
steps.content: Cut the Rope. Cut the Rope is a popular puzzle game. In this game, you must cut the rope to feed a piece of candy to a cute monster, and the levels get harder the higher up you get. To play Cut the Rope, try one of these links: https://www.vortice.app/play/cut-the-rope/ https://www.coolmathgames.com/0-cut-the-rope https://www.gamepix.com/play/cut-the-rope

steps.title: The Chrome Dino Game.
steps.content: The Chrome Dino Game. When Google Chrome can't connect to the internet, it lets you play a fun endless runner game with a dinosaur, and there are a few replicas of this game online that you can play. To play the Chrome Dino Game, try one of these links: https://www.coolmathgames.com/0-dinosaur-game https://chromedino.com/ https://poki.com/en/g/dinosaur-game

steps.title: Winterbells.
steps.content: Winterbells. Winterbells is a vertical platforming game where you play as a rabbit jumping on bells. The higher you go, the harder the game gets. To play Winterbells, try one of these links: https://www.crazygames.com/game/winterbells https://llerrah.com/winterbells.htm https://www.numuki.com/game/fh-winterbells/

steps.title: Snake.
steps.content: Snake. Snake is a classic game where you try to make your snake longer and longer without running into your own tail. To play Snake, try one of these links: https://www.google.com/search?q=google+snake+game https://snake.io https://playsnake.org

steps.title: Agar.io.
steps.content: Agar.io. Agar.io is a game where you try to get your circle the biggest by eating smaller circles. While your school might have agar.io blocked, there are a few clones that you can try. To play agar.io, try one of these links: https://www.crazygames.com/game/agario https://agario.school https://www.agame.com/game/agar

steps.title: Cookie Clicker.
steps.content: Cookie Clicker. Cookie Clicker is exactly what it sounds like: a clicker game where you make cookies. Despite the simple gameplay it's a fun and addicting game to play. To play Cookie Clicker, try one of these links: https://www.frenchrevising.com/games/cookieclicker https://sites.google.com/site/classroom6x/cookie-clicker https://orteil.dashnet.org/cookieclicker/

steps.title: Moto X3M.
steps.content: Moto X3M. Moto X3M is a motocross racing and obstacle course game. It's fun and fast-paced, and gets harder the farther you get in the game. To play Moto X3M, try one of these links: https://www.frenchrevising.com/games/motox3m https://sites.google.com/site/classroom6x/moto-x3m https://moto-x3m.io

steps.title: Papa's Pizzeria.
steps.content: Papa's Pizzeria. Papa's Pizzeria is a management sim game where you work at a pizza shop. It's a fun game where you take orders, make pizzas, and serve them to the right customers. To play Papa's Pizzeria, try one of these links: https://www.coolmathgames.com/0-papas-pizzeria https://www.hoodamath.com/games/papaspizzeria.html https://papaspizzeria.io

steps.title: Frogger.
steps.content: Frogger. Frogger is a retro game where you play as a frog trying to cross a busy street. The more levels you play, the harder the game gets, and the challenge is sure to keep you from getting bored at school. To play Frogger, try one of these links: https://www.vortice.app/play/frogger/ https://happyhopper.org https://froggerclassic.appspot.com

steps.title: Monkey Mart.
steps.content: Monkey Mart. Monkey Mart is a cute management game where you play as a monkey who runs a supermarket. As you progress through the game you'll unlock more and more things to sell in the monkey's store. To play Monkey Mart, try one of these links: https://monkey-mart.io https://jman1593.github.io/html/monkey%20mart/index.html https://strongdog.com/html/monkey%20mart/index.html

steps.title: Snow Rider 3D.
steps.content: Snow Rider 3D. Snow Rider 3D is an obstacle course game where you control a sled going down a snowy mountain. If you like games like Run 3 or MotoX3M, give Snow Rider 3D a try. To play Snow Rider 3D, try one of these links: https://www.vortice.app/play/snowrider/ https://strongdog.com/html/snow-rider-3d/index.html https://jman1593.github.io/html/snow-rider-3d/index.html

steps.title: The Impossible Quiz.
steps.content: The Impossible Quiz. While doing a quiz at school might not sound fun, this quiz is nothing like what you do in class. The Impossible Quiz will have you thinking outside of the box to try and figure out the answers. To play The Impossible Quiz, try one of these links: https://jman1593.github.io/html/impossiblequiz/index.html https://the-impossiblequiz.github.io https://the-impossible-quiz.github.io

steps.title: Mr. Mine.
steps.content: Mr. Mine. Mr. Mine is an idle mining simulator game, which means you can play this game while you're also doing classwork. The farther you get in the game, you'll find rarer materials. There's also a number of fun quests to complete. To play Mr. Mine, try one of these links: https://www.coolmathgames.com/0-mr-mine https://www.snokido.com/game/mr-mine https://mrmine.com

steps.title: Core-ball.
steps.content: Core-ball. Core-ball is a game that's easy to understand but hard to master. All you have to do is throw balls at the core ball without hitting the other balls attached to the core. To play core-ball, try one of these links: https://www.arealme.com/coreball/en/ https://jman1593.github.io/html/core-ball/index.html https://strongdog.com/html/core-ball/index.html

steps.title: Smash Karts.
steps.content: Smash Karts. Smash Karts is like a racing game and a battle arena game combined into one. It's a fun and fast-paced game where you unlock more items with each level you get. To play Smash Karts, try one of these links: https://smashkartsonline.github.io https://jman1593.github.io/html/smash%20karts/index.html https://strongdog.com/html/smash%20karts/index.html

steps.title: Crossy Road.
steps.content: Crossy Road. Crossy Road is similar to Frogger, but the goal of the game is to travel as far as you can without getting hit by a car. Plus, there's a bunch of fun characters to collect as you play the game. To play Crossy Road, try one of these links: https://www.vortice.app/play/crossy/ https://www.snokido.com/game/crossy-road https://ducklife.online/crossy-road
